item.title: Introducing Google Season ofÂ Docs
item.description: Google believes that open source is good for everyone. By being open and freely available, it enables and encourages collaboration, development of technology and solving real-world problems. Over the years, Google has created a healthy ecosystem for the sustainability of open source for all via its several communities Beyond the open source software we directly use and release at Google, we also work to support the sustainability of open source organizations and communities.
